extension_description.message: Automatically inserts Google Translate Element into the page. Translate the entire page without leaving it or opening a new tab.

translate_automatically.message: Translate immediately after inserting Google Translate Element

hide_toolbar.message: Hide toolbar after inserting Google Translate Element

ignore_languages.message: Languages ​​that do not automatically insert Google Translate Element

ignore_languages_desc.message:
Automatically inserts Google Translate Element into the page if the language of the page is different from these languages. Even if the language of the page is the same to one of these languages it can be inserted manually from the context menu. When you click the default button, language information is acquired from about:preferences → Language.
Example: en, de, zh. Separated by commas.
Reference: Language support Google Cloud (different service from Google Translate Element), List of ISO 639-1 codes - Wikipedia.

includedlanguages.message: Destination languages of Google Translate Element

includedlanguages_desc.message:
Separate with commas without spaces. Example: en,de,zh-CN.
Reference: Language support Google Cloud (different service from Google Translate Element), List of ISO 639-1 codes - Wikipedia, ISO 3166-1 - Wikipedia.
If you empty the list, all languages are displayed in the translation destination language of Google Translate Element. The default value is obtained from about:preferences → Language, but it may not be usable as it is. Because some languages require region codes like zh-CN or zh-TW, and in other languages, if you add region codes like en-US it will not work and you need to delete them to make it like en.

ignore_urls.message: URLs where Google Translate Element is NOT automatically inserted

auto_insert_urls.message: URLs where Google Translate Element is automatically inserted

ignore_urls_desc.message: Escape the regular expression special characters such as ".", "*", "?" with a backslash. Add "^" at the beginning of the pattern to match the beginning of the URL.

page_translator_url.message: Translator's URL when translating a page in a new tab

text_translator_url.message: Translator's URL when translating selected texts in a new tab

target_language_regexp.message: Regular expression to extract the target language from the URL of the translation site

translator_url_desc.message: '@url@' is replaced with the URL of the page. '@text@' is replaced with the selected text. '@lang@' is replaced with "Default Target Language". The value of Default Target Language is obtained from about:preferences → Language. However, since it may be different from the format of the target language of each translation site, it may not be used as it is. Some languages may require region codes such as 'zh-CN' and 'zh-TW', and in other languages, it may not work if the region code is attached like 'en-US' or 'pt-BR', so it may need to be changed to 'en' or 'pt'. In that case, you must manually replace default target language with the appropriate language code. '@source_lang@' is replaced with the language code of the selected string or the language code of the page. However, this does not always match the expression of the language code used by each translation site.

display_in_iframe.message: In the browser action panel, page action panel and sidebar, the translation result is displayed in an iframe

translator_url_desc2.message: The value of '@lang@' in this browser:

target_language_regexp_desc.message: A character string that matches the last capture group in the pattern described in "Regular expression for extracting target language" is extracted from the URL of the translation result page as the target language for translation. When the language of the translation destination is changed interactively on the translation result page, if the URL changes accordingly, the language is extracted and stored. In the next translation, '@lang@' will be replaced with this value instead of the default target language before translation. If you always want to translate to the default language, leave the regular expression empty. This function cannot be used on translation sites where the URL does not change even if the target language is changed interactively.

use_2nd_translator.message: When the language of the page or the language of the selected text matches the "Languages not to be automatically inserted", translate it on the second translation site

page_translator_2nd_url.message: URL of the second translation site when translating the page in a new tab

text_translator_2nd_url.message: URL of the second translation site when the selected text is translated in a new tab

translator_2nd_url_desc.message: When the language of the page or the language of the selected text matches the "Languages not to be automatically inserted", translation is performed at the second translation site. This can be used, for example, to translate native language sentences into other languages. If you hold down a modifier key ("Alt", "Command", "Ctrl", "MacCtrl" or "Shift") and click on the context menu or use a shortcut key, you can use the second translation site to translate whatever language the page or selected text is. If you register another site in the second translation site, you can compare the two translation results.

translator_delete_history.message: Delete translation result URL from browsing history

browser_action_button_desc.message: If no item is selected, clicking the browser action button will display the default text translation site. If only one item is selected, clicking the browser action button will immediately execute the action for that item. If multiple items are selected, clicking the browser action button displays the buttons for the selected items. Drag to change the display order.

page_action_button_desc.message: If no item is selected, clicking the page action button will display the default text translation site. If only one item is selected, clicking the page action button will immediately execute the action for that item. If multiple items are selected, clicking the page action button displays the buttons for the selected items. Drag to change the display order.

context_menu_order.message: Order to display in context menu:

context_menu_order_desc.message: Only checked items are displayed in the context menu. Drag to change the display order.

omnibox_desc.message: Translate text by entering commands and text in omnibox (address bar, location bar). It is convenient to use the keyboard shortcut to move the focus to omnibox. F6, Alt + D or Ctrl + L on Windows.

omnibox_default_action.message: Default display destination of omnibox translation results:

omnibox_keyword.message: The trigger keyword to start translation with omnibox.

omnibox_option_t.message: Specify the target language. If omitted, the default target language for the text translation site will be used. The target language format varies from translation site to translation site, so you need to know the appropriate language code for that site.

omnibox_option_1.message: Translate using the default text translation site.

omnibox_option_2.message: Translate using a second text translation site. If both -1 and -2 are omitted, the site used for translation is determined by the language of the entered text.

omnibox_option_d.message: Specify the display destination of translation results.

omnibox_option_sidebar.message: Sidebar. The add-on cannot automatically open the sidebar, so the user must open it manually.

omnibox_option_browser_action.message: Browser action panel. The add-on cannot automatically open the browser action panel, so the user must open it manually.

omnibox_option_page_action.message: Page action panel. The add-on cannot automatically open the page action panel, so the user must open it manually.

omnibox_examples.message: Examples: tr Hello, world. --- Use the default translation site to translate to your native language. tr -2 -t de -d sb みなさんこんにちは。 --- Translate to German using a second translation site and display the result in the sidebar.

shortcut_keys_desc.message: To set shortcut keys, go to about:addons -> ⚙️ Gear icon -> Manage Extension Shortcuts.

tab_window_session.message: Session information for specific tabs and windows:

tab_window_session_desc.message: Memorize the information of the translation result display window and a specific tab across sessions, and reuse the same tab and window after restarting the browser.

specific_tab_esc_behavior.message: Behavior when the Esc key is pressed:

specific_tab_esc_textarea.message: Does the same even when typing in the text area

specific_tab_set_favicon.message: Display add-on icon as favicon on the specific tab

specific_tab_desc.message: If the specific tab exists, reuse that tab and display the translation result on that tab without opening a new tab.

result_window_esc_behavior.message: Behavior when the Esc key is pressed:

lower_window.message: Move the window to the back

result_window_esc_textarea.message: Does the same even when typing in the text area

result_window_desc.message: The position and size of the window displaying the translation result are stored when the focus is transferred to another window of the browser. The first and second page translation sites and the text translation site are stored separately.

sidebar_placeholder.message: Ctrl + Enter to translate. Shift + Enter to translate on the second site.

translate_clipboard_content_desc.message: The contents of the clipboard can be translated by using shortcut keys, clicking an item in the context menu with the second mouse button, or holding down the control key and clicking a button in the browser action panel or page action panel.

need_history_permission.message: Additional permission is required to delete translation result URL from browsing history.

need_tabHide_permission.message: Additional permission is required to hide the tab when pressing the Esc key.

need_sessions_permission.message: Additional permission is required to save sessions for the specific tab and the translation result window.

need_clipboard_permission.message: Additional permission is required to translate the contents of the clipboard.

please_allow_permission.message: Please allow the permission or change the setting and save again.

save_button_desc.message: All save buttons behave the same.

info1.message:
Google Translate Element may not work on some pages due to security restrictions on those pages. In this case, a message is displayed in the Browser Console. If it does not work, you can translate that page in a new tab from the context menu as an alternative.

If you disable the add-on from the context menu, Google Translate Element will not be inserted automatically. Again, you can insert it manually from the context menu.

code_to_insert_into_the_page.message: Code to insert into web pages:

copy_code_here.message: Copy the code here from the download page.

copy_scp_here.message: Copy the Content Security Policy here from the download page.

tags_to_remove_from_page.message: HTML tags to remove from page:

tags_to_remove_from_page_desc.message: To get better translation results, remove these tags from the web page and convert the content texts to simple texts. If HTML tags are included in the middle of a sentence, the sentence passed to the translation engine may be different from a simple sentence without tags in order to reflect those tags in the translated sentence, which sometimes results in strange translation results. Removing these HTML tags may give you more correct translation results. However, it becomes difficult to read because there are no links or decorations. To remove the tag, execute the process from the context menu, shortcut key, etc., before Google Translate Element translates the page (when the original text is displayed). If you want to restore the contents of the page, you need to reload the page. When adding tags, separate them with white spaces or line breaks.

translate_on_2nd_in_specific_tab.message: Translate on the second translation site in specific tab

translate_on_2nd_in_new_tab.message: Translate on the second translation site in new tab

translate_on_2nd_in_current_tab.message: Translate on the second translation site in current tab

translate_on_2nd_in_window.message: Translate on the second translation site in window

translate_on_2nd_in_sidebar.message: Translate on the second translation site in sidebar

translate_on_2nd_in_browser_action.message: Translate on the second translation site in browser action

translate_on_2nd_in_page_action.message: Translate on the second translation site in page action

translate_in_specific_tab_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in specific tab

translate_in_new_tab_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in new tab

translate_in_current_tab_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in current tab

translate_in_window_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in window

translate_in_sidebar_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in sidebar

translate_in_browser_action_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in browser action panel

translate_in_page_action_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard in page action panel

translate_on_2nd_in_specific_tab_clipboa.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in specific tab

translate_on_2nd_in_new_tab_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in new tab

translate_on_2nd_in_current_tab_clipboar.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in current tab

translate_on_2nd_in_window_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in window

translate_on_2nd_in_sidebar_clipboard.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in sidebar

translate_on_2nd_in_browser_action_clipb.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in browser action

translate_on_2nd_in_page_action_clipboar.message: Translate the contents of the clipboard on the second translation site in page action

open_1_in_specific_tab.message: Open translation site in specific tab

open_1_in_new_tab.message: Open translation site in new tab

open_1_in_current_tab.message: Open translation site in current tab

open_2_in_specific_tab.message: Open the second translation site in specific tab

open_2_in_new_tab.message: Open the second translation site in new tab

open_2_in_current_tab.message: Open the second translation site in current tab

open_2_in_window.message: Open the second translation site in window

insert_element.message: Insert Google Translate Element in page

toggle_translate.message: Switch between translation and source text

toggle_toolbar.message: Show / hide toolbar of Google Translate Element

remove_decorative_tags.message: Remove decoration tags from the page

update_info.message: Google Translate Element can now be automatically inserted only for specific URLs.
